thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com
thread.title: Marvin Romero

author: Marvin Romero
title: Marvin Romero
text: So first, I got a code for a free pair of glasses by signing up with email, but I didn't know there was an expiration date! So I emailed them and they kindly told me to let them know when I was going to order a free pair so they could extend it. Bam. Great customer service. Second, I ordered two pairs of glasses (but 1 get 1 free) but they ended up being small on my face, so I emailed them so I could return them and order new ones. They emailed me back saying to keep my current pairs as back up and gave me a $30 voucher code for a new pair. They're the best, they're kind and generous. Only positive experiences so far!
